long_description: With its stretch fabric and extended coverage, the men's REI Sariska T-Shirt keeps you comfortable on the yoga mat. Fabric blend offers a balance of easy care and 4-way stretch flexibility; fabric's polyester component comes from recycled material. Fabric also provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Mat-friendly design provides extended length for full coverage during poses. The men's REI Sariska T-Shirt has an active fit that provides for a full range of motion.
short_description: With its stretch fabric and extended coverage, the men's REI Sariska T-Shirt keeps you comfortable on the yoga mat.
